translation.en: Why aren't you asking me who it was?
translation.it: Perché non mi chiedi chi era?

translation.en: Fuck you, Luke. Fuck you!
-I'm sorry. -You owe him money?
translation.it: - Mi dispiace. - Ha detto che gli devi dei soldi.

translation.en: This guy said. And that he sent you a message last night?
translation.it: - Mi dispiace. - Ha detto che gli devi dei soldi. E che ieri sera ti ha inviato un messaggio.

translation.en: [Luke] I'm sorry. Okay? I'm so sorry.
They broke into my mother's house, Luke!
translation.it: È entrato in casa di mia madre!

translation.en: -I… I am so sorry. -Did you know?
You must have, right? That's why you said you'd pay for the damages.
translation.it: Ma certo, ecco perché volevi pagare i danni.

translation.en: -Can you let me explain? -Yes!
I'm an addict.
I'm clean now.
-Two years sober, okay? -And what? This guy was your dealer?
translation.it: - Sono sobrio da due anni. - Quel tizio era il tuo spacciatore?

translation.en: That's why your dad stopped talking to you. Because you were using.
translation.it: Tuo padre ha smesso di parlarti perché ti facevi.

translation.en: When my mom died, I, uh… I got into her medication just to cope.
translation.it: Quando mia madre morì, cercai rifugio nelle sue medicine.

translation.en: But when I ran out, Johnno was right there to help me.
translation.it: Ma quando finirono, Johnno era lì, pronto ad aiutarmi.

translation.en: -What does that have anything to do-- -[Luke] Okay. Yeah. [grunts]
translation.it: - Ma cosa c'entra con… - Ok, sì.

translation.en: I stole a $50,000 car from my dad.
translation.it: Rubai a mio padre un'auto da 50.000 $.

translation.en: A classic Corvette.
He was rebuilding it for one of his biggest customers.
translation.it: La stava restaurando per un suo grosso cliente.

translation.en: And I broke in.
I was out of my mind, and…
I was desperate.
I was gonna sell it, and instead, I just…
took it on the freeway, and I totaled it.
And he said if I didn't pay that customer back, he'd turn me in himself.
translation.it: Se non avessi risarcito il cliente, mi avrebbe denunciato.

translation.en: You weren't kidding about him.
Whatever I didn't have, I borrowed from Johnno.
translation.it: Chiesi a Johnno di prestarmi una parte dei soldi.

translation.en: This is why you needed to marry me.
Yeah.
Yeah, but look.
I dealt with him.
-Okay? I paid him. It's done. -[inhales deeply]
translation.it: Gli ho ridato i soldi. È finita.

translation.en: [sobbing] They could have hurt her, and she's the only thing that I have.
translation.it: Ho solo lei al mondo, avrebbero potuto farle del male.

translation.en: -I know, Cassie. I know, I know. -No. No.
translation.it: - Lo so, Cassie. Lo so. - No.

translation.en: Don't… Don't just walk away.
Okay, I'm sorry. Not every man you let into your life is a bad guy that you can't trust.
translation.it: Mi spiace. Non tutti gli uomini che entrano nella tua vita sono cattivi.

translation.en: Really, Luke? What are you?
translation.it: - E tu cosa sei? - Una persona che c'è quando hai bisogno.

translation.en: I am someone who shows up when you need me.
translation.it: - E tu cosa sei? - Una persona che c'è quando hai bisogno. Non ho bisogno di te.

translation.en: I don't need you.
Just listen, okay? [sniffles]
I am so sorry.
-I messed up. -Go stay at your dad's or your brother's.
translation.it: - Ho rovinato tutto. - Vai da tuo padre o da tuo fratello.

translation.en: And tell them that we're getting divorced.
I'm gonna go to my show tonight,
but when I come back tomorrow, I want you gone.
translation.it: ma al mio ritorno non voglio trovarti.

translation.en: -We played so hard. What did you do? -[laughing]
translation.it: Che botta di adrenalina! Che hai fatto?

translation.en: [Nora] I've never seen you play like that in your life!
translation.it: - Non ti ho mai vista suonare così. - Ok.

translation.en: I know a bunch of those people out there. They're freaking out.
translation.it: Conosco alcune persone tra il pubblico e stanno impazzendo.

translation.en: Marina, promoter from The Hollywood Bowl, wants you to open for Florence and the Machine in a couple weeks.
translation.it: Marina dell'Hollywood Bowl vuole che apriate il concerto di Florence!

translation.en: What? [Toby] The Loyal and Florence and the Machine.
translation.it: - Cosa? - The Loyal e Florence and the Machine.

translation.en: -What? -This is massive!
[Nora] Hollywood Bowl!
[man] Lance Corporal Morrow, I need you to return to base with me.
translation.it: Caporale Morrow, deve tornare alla base con me.

translation.en: I'll give you a few minutes to grab your gear.
translation.it: Le do qualche minuto per prendere le sue cose.

translation.en: Hello?
translation.it: - Pronto? - Luke è stato accusato di frode.

translation.en: [Jacob] Luke wants you to know that he's been charged with fraud and detained.
translation.it: - Pronto? - Luke è stato accusato di frode. È stato arrestato.

translation.en: They've said you two have a fake marriage in order to get benefits. Is this true?
translation.it: Pare che abbiate finto di sposarvi per godere dei benefici. È vero?

translation.en: Wait, where is Luke?
[Jacob] I'm headed to base to see him now. There's gonna be a trial in a few weeks.
translation.it: Sto andando da lui adesso. A breve ci sarà il processo.

translation.en: Then you'll also be hearing from the police about your role in all this. -Was it all an act? -Uh…
translation.it: La polizia interrogherà anche te sul ruolo hai avuto. Era una messinscena?

translation.en: Not… Not all of it.
Even I thought you were good for him.
translation.it: E io che pensavo fossi giusta per lui.

translation.en: I thought you were bringing my son back to me.
translation.it: Pensavo mi avresti riavvicinato a mio figlio.

translation.en: Hi.
[court official] All rise.
Good morning. Be seated.
We're here today for a hearing in the case of Lance Corporal Luke A. Morrow.
translation.it: Oggi siamo qui per l'udienza del caso del caporale Luke A. Morrow.

translation.en: Lance Corporal Morrow stands accused
translation.it: Il Caporale è accusato di aver contratto matrimonio fraudolento

translation.en: of entering into a fraudulent marriage in order to collect BAH
translation.it: Il Caporale è accusato di aver contratto matrimonio fraudolento per poter ottenere un sussidio per l'affitto e per i famigliari a carico,

translation.en: and FSA pay in violation of article 132 of the UCMJ.
translation.it: per poter ottenere un sussidio per l'affitto e per i famigliari a carico, violando l'articolo 132 dell'UCMJ.

translation.en: We have a signed affidavit from Jonathan Deluca's testimony
translation.it: Jonathan Deluca ha firmato una testimonianza giurata

translation.en: of the fraudulent marriage.
Lance Corporal Morrow's wife, Miss Salazar, is a civilian.
translation.it: La moglie del caporale Morrow, la sig.na Salazar, è una civile.

translation.en: So, her case will be referred to state authorities, and they may pursue criminal charges.
translation.it: Verrà giudicata dalle autorità statali, che potrebbero procedere penalmente.

translation.en: They will have access to the transcripts of these proceedings.
translation.it: Avranno accesso alle trascrizioni di questo processo.

translation.en: -I wanna make a statement. -Lance Corporal, I can't advise that.
If you don't say anything, we have a good chance of winning.
Tell the judge I'd like to make a statement.
Lance Corporal Morrow, how do you plead?
[defense] Your Honor, my client wishes to speak.
translation.it: Vostro Onore, il mio cliente vorrebbe parlare.

translation.en: [softly] What?
-[murmuring] -Luke.
[judge] You may proceed.
[Luke] Sir.
I coerced Miss Salazar into marrying me.
translation.it: Ho costretto la sig.na Salazar a sposarmi.

translation.en: Um, she didn't know that it violated military law.
translation.it: Non sapeva di violare la legge militare.

translation.en: -I assured her it didn't. -No.
translation.it: - L'ho convinta che non era così. - No.

translation.en: I bear full responsibility, and I'm prepared to face the consequences of my actions.
translation.it: Me ne assumo piena responsabilità e ne affronterò le conseguenze.

translation.en: [judge] Very well. -Then I find you guilty. -[gasps]
translation.it: Molto bene. Allora la dichiaro colpevole.

translation.en: [judge] Lance Corporal Morrow,
upon completion of your sentence, you'll be discharged for bad conduct.
translation.it: al termine della sua condanna, verrà congedato per cattiva condotta.

translation.en: You will report for your six-month sentence tomorrow at 1700 hours.
translation.it: Domani alle 17:00 si presenterà per scontare la pena di sei mesi.

translation.en: Given the outcome of this trial, this court will not
refer Miss Salazar's case to the local authorities.
translation.it: questa corte non denuncerà la sig.na Salazar alle autorità locali.

translation.en: [minister] Do you pledge to love this man?
To be true and loyal to him
and to comfort and keep him
in sickness and in health.
I do.
[minister] By the power vested in me by the great State of California,
translation.it: Per il potere conferitomi dallo Stato della California,

translation.en: it is my honor to pronounce you husband and wife.
You may kiss the bride.
[laughing] Oh my God, it is so full out there.
-[announcer] Please take your seats. -[Nora] Whew.
[announcer] Ladies and gentlemen,
translation.it: Signori e signori, ecco a voi

translation.it: Signori e signori, ecco a voi Cassie Salazar e i The Loyal.

-Right there? Thank you. -Yeah. Right here.
Hi, Billy.

I'm sorry to say, but it's time.

Mm. Time to go.
